title: Top Places to visit in Tirupattur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tirupattur is a town and also the headquarter of Tirupattur district, India, one of the oldest places in Tamil Nadu. It is known for its reservoir of fine sandal wood in the trailing mountains around it. It is located about 42 km from Krishnagiri, 85 km from Hosur, 85 km from Thiruvannamalai, 210
